Package Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers

Class BattleViewController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers.BattleViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener, GameListener
public class BattleViewController extends Object implements ActionListener, GameListener
A class to manage user interaction with the view about a Battle
